Archetype-Wrestler -- Male Changeling Human Fighter: 10
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +3 Charisma: +2
Background: Emissary Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 9011/10000 Level: 10 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Hardy Traveler: +1 Encumbered Bulk/+1 Maximum Bulk
Hardy Traveler: +10' Speed during overland travel
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 6; General: 2; Skill: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Fighter (Key Attribute); Fighter (Weapon Group); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Aerial Piledriver; Battle Medicine; Clinch Strike; Combat Grab; Courtly Graces; Crushing Grab; Disengaging Twist; Elbow Breaker; Form Lock; Godbreaker; Hardy Traveler; Haughty Obstinacy; Impressive Performance; Inescapable Grasp; Magical Crafting; Natural Medicine; Running Tackle; Skill Training (Accounting Lore); Skill Training (Tea Lore); Snagging Strike; Spinebreaker; Strangle; Submission Hold; Suplex; Unconventional Weaponry (Temple Sword); Whirling Throw; Wrestler Dedication Changeling Features: Changeling Heritage; Low-Light Vision Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Dexterity); Attribute Boosts; Battle Hardened; Battlefield Surveyor; Bravery; Class Trained (Fighter); Combat Flexibility; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Dexterity; Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Fighter Weapon Mastery; General Feats; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spears; Weapon Specialization Emissary Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Charisma, Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Multilingual; Skill Trained (Society; Choose 1 from any Settlement Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 3 from any)
Fighter Feats: Class Feats (Choose 6 from any)
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Fighter Weapon Mastery: 1 selection
General Feats: General Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 5 from any)
Wrestler Dedication: Has the Titan Wrestler feature
Changeling Heritage: Has the changeling trait and can take changeling ancestry feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +19 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Accounting Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Diplomacy: +14 (charisma; trained) Religion: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Acrobatics: +16 (dexterity; trained) Intimidation: +14 (charisma; trained) Society: +18 (intelligence; expert)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +17 (wisdom; expert) Stealth: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Athletics: +18 (strength; master) Nature: +15 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +15 (wisdom; trained)
Crafting: +20 (intelligence; master) Occultism: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Tea Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +14 (charisma; trained) Thievery: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Languages: Common; Goblin; Jotun; Osiriani; Shoanti; Sussuran; Vudrani; Ysoki
Skill Notes:
Battlefield Surveyor: Perception Master
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 7 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 4 from any)
Skill Training (Accounting Lore): Skill Trained (Accounting Lore)
Skill Training (Tea Lore): Skill Trained (Tea Lore)
Wrestler Dedication: Skill Expert (Athletics)
Battle Medicine: (1) Uses Medicine to restore Hit Points once per target per day
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Impressive Performance: Can use Performance to Make An Impression
Magical Crafting: Can Craft magic items and knows the formulas for 4 common magic items of 2nd level or lower
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 26 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bastard Sword (+16 1d8+2 S [2h d12]; strength; expert); Longbow (+18 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Maul (+16 1d12+2 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Spears): Attack Master (Simple Spears; Martial Spears)/Attack Expert (Advanced Spears)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Temple Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Temple Sword)
Aerial Piledriver: (2) Successful unarmed melee Strike vs. a grabbed or restrained foe inflicts prone and additional damage equal to 1d6 HP per damage die; failure releases the foe, and a critical failure inflicts prone on self
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Clinch Strike: (R) Strikes a foe that Escapes from being grabbed or restrained
Combat Flexibility: Gains 1 chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level during daily prep
Combat Grab: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts grabbed until the end of the next turn or until the target Escapes
Crushing Grab: Can inflict 2 HP bludgeoning, lethal or nonlethal, with a successful Grapple
Disengaging Twist: (R) Makes a +2 Athletics check to Escape from being grabbed or restrained
Elbow Breaker: (1) Successful unarmed melee Strike vs. a grabbed or restrained foe gives +2 to further Disarm attempts and inflicts -2 attacks with the item until the foe changes of its grip; critical success forces the foe to drop the item
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Form Lock: (1) Successful Athletics check counteracts a polymorph effect affecting a grabbed or restrained foe once per target per day
Godbreaker: (3) Successful unarmed Strike after throwing a grappled foe upward 20' also inflicts falling damage and allows repeating twice; hitting with all 3 Strikes inflicts additional unarmed Strike damage, retains grapple, and negates falling damage to self
Inescapable Grasp: Grabbed and restrained foes require a successful DC 15 flat check to teleport or to Escape via unfettered movement
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Running Tackle: (2) Attempts a Grapple or Shove after a double Stride or during a High Jump or Long Jump
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Spinebreaker: (1) Successful Grapple vs. a grabbed or restrained foe inflicts clumsy 1 until the end of its next turn, or clumsy 2 until the end of its next turn and clumsy 1 for 1 min on a critical success
Strangle: (1) Successful unarmed melee Strike vs. a grabbed or restrained foe inflicts additional damage equal to the number of damage dice, along with requiring a successful DC 10 flat check to perform any action that requires speech
Submission Hold: (1) Successful Grapple vs. a grabbed or restrained foe inflicts enfeebled 1 until the end of its next turn, or enfeebled 2 until the end of its next turn and enfeebled 1 for 1 min on a critical success
Suplex: (1) Successful unarmed Strike vs. a grabbed or restrained foe releases hold and inflicts prone, plus 2d6 HP bludgeoning on a critical success
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 2 sizes larger
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Whirling Throw: (1) A successful Athletics vs. a grabbed or restrained foe's Fortitude DC allows throwing it 20', inflicting 2d6+2 HP bludgeoning, plus knocked prone on a critical success
Wrestler Dedication: Suffers no penalty for inflicting lethal damage with nonlethal unarmed attacks
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; master); Reflex: +18 (dexterity; expert); Will: +17 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Battle Hardened: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Battle Hardened: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Wrestler Dedication: +2 Fortitude DC to Grapple or Swallow Whole
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 6 available vs. 17 allocated
Form Lock Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 14 and monk level >= 14 or wrestler dedication feature (currently 1)
Godbreaker Feat: Requires crushing grab feature (currently 1), whirling throw feature (currently 1) and monk level >= 20 or wrestler dedication level (currently 10) >= 20
Inescapable Grasp Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 12 and wrestler dedication feature (currently 1)
